クラス CustomExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.co.axa.apidemo.controllers.CustomExceptionHandler

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class CustomExceptionHandler
extends Object
    Global exception handler for our controllers
    作成者:
    Arthur Campos Costa

    • メソッドの詳細

      • handleResourceNotFound

        @ExceptionHandler(value=ResourceNotFoundException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response<Void>> handleResourceNotFound(ResourceNotFoundException ex,
                                                                                                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        ResourceNotFoundException handler. This exception is thrown when an employee was not found
        パラメータ:
        ex - ResourceNotFoundException
        request - http servlet request
        戻り値:
        ResponseEntity with custom response and status 404

      • handleMethodArgumentNotValid

        @ExceptionHandler(value=org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response<Void>> handleMethodArgumentNotValid(org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException ex,
                                                                                                                                                                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        MethodArgumentNotValidException handler. This exception is thrown when Employee body is invalid.
        パラメータ:
        ex - MethodArgumentNotValidException
        request - http servlet request
        戻り値:
        ResponseEntity with custom response and status 400

      • handleMethodArgumentTypeMismatchException

        @ExceptionHandler(value={org.springframework.web.method.annotation.MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException.class,java.lang.IllegalArgumentException.class})
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response<Void>> handleMethodArgumentTypeMismatchException(RuntimeException ex,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException and IllegalArgumentException handler. These exceptions are thrown when query or path parameters are invalid
        パラメータ:
        ex - MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException or IllegalArgumentException
        request - http servlet request
        戻り値:
        ResponseEntity with custom response and status 400

      • handleException

        @ExceptionHandler(value=java.lang.Exception.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response<Void>> handleException(Exception ex,
                                                                                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handler for any other unexpected Exception.
        パラメータ:
        ex - Exception
        request - http servlet request
        戻り値:
        @return ResponseEntity with custom response and status 500
